duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage one or more handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and post-project data analysis.
Apply knowledge of Life Sciences and Physical Sciences to item development and scoring processes.
Communicate with clients, educators, and team members via various channels including chat, email, phone, and videoconferencing.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers in fulfilling their roles and responsibilities.
Ensure compliance with state and national science standards in item development and scoring processes.
Manage and score Math assessments as required by the project.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences (Master’s preferred); Additional Math college courses preferred
